mapper.select:
SELECT vq.* FROM v_org_ques vq WHERE 1=1
AND (wid=#{insId} AND qupid IS NULL) OR opid=#{insId}

SELECT * FROM v_org_ques WHERE 1=1
and wid!=#{insId} AND qupid IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT * FROM v_org_ques WHERE 1=1
AND opid!=#{insId} AND qupid IS NOT NULL

select vq.id , vq.wid , vq.opid , vq.qupid , vq.name , vq.TYPE , vq.pid from v_org_ques vq where 1=1
and vq.id=#{id}
